name: 123 Kids Fun MEMO CARDS Matching Slide Puzzle Game
name_original: 123 Kids Fun MEMO CARDS Matching Slide Puzzle Game
description:
Simple memo game for toddlers and preschoolers, with dinosaurs, sea animals and aliens. There are 20 cards on the screen. Discover two cards and try to memorize pictures that appear.

Your task is to find two identical cards. Try to do it as quickly as possible.

Boards with pictures in three different categories:

• Dinosaurs,
• Sea animals,
• Aliens.

Boards with the cards are chosen randomly.

+++ FEATURES +++

• Designed for Kids: no confusing menus or navigation
• Bright, colorful, child-friendly design.

+++

Our apps are entertaining, but more importantly, they teach at the same time. We pride ourselves in creating fun, beautiful, well designed and easy to use apps.

We love getting feedback from our users. If you have questions or comments, please send them to: contact@123kidsfun.com
